msDesc.head: Suidae Lexicon (Κ-Ο, Ω, Π-Τ, ΟΙ, Υ-Ψ); Italy (Milan), 1454

msItem.title: Suidae Lexicon
msItem.note: Κ-Ο, Ω, Π-Τ, ΟΙ, Υ-Ψ, possibly the second part of a full set.
Κ, tit. in red ink: ἀρχὴ τοῦ κάππα· στοιχείου· ed. A. Adler, Suidae lexicon, Lexicographi Graeci, vol. 1, pars III, Leipzig, 1933, pp. 1–224.
Λ, tit. in red ink: + ἀρχὴ τοῦ λαῦδα· στοιχείου: ed. A. Adler, Suidae lexicon, Lexicographi Graeci, vol. 1, pars III, pp. 225–303.
Μ, tit. in red ink: + ἀρχὴ τοῦ μ῀ στοιχείου· ed. A. Adler, Suidae lexicon, Lexicographi Graeci, vol. 1, pars III, pp. 304–431.
Ν, tit. in red ink: + ἀρχὴ τοῦ Ν῀ στοιχείου· ed. A. Adler, Suidae lexicon, Lexicographi Graeci, vol. 1, pars III, pp. 432–490.
Ξ, ed. A. Adler, Suidae lexicon, Lexicographi Graeci, vol. 1, pars III, pp. 491–504.
Ο, ed. A. Adler, Suidae lexicon, Lexicographi Graeci, vol. 1, pars III, pp. 505–603.
Ω, ed. A. Adler, Suidae lexicon, Lexicographi Graeci, vol. 1, pars III, pp. 604–632.
Π, ed. A. Adler, Suidae lexicon, Lexicographi Graeci, vol. 1, pars IV, Leipzig, 1935, pp. 1–280
Ῥ, ed. A. Adler, Suidae lexicon, Lexicographi Graeci, vol. 1, pars IV, pp. 281–309.
Σ, ed. A. Adler, Suidae lexicon, Lexicographi Graeci, vol. 1, pars IV, pp. 310–493.
Τ, ed. A. Adler, Suidae lexicon, Lexicographi Graeci, vol. 1, pars IV, pp. 494–613.
ΟΙ, ed. A. Adler, Suidae lexicon, Lexicographi Graeci, vol. 1, pars IV, pp. 614–630.
Υ, ed. A. Adler, Suidae lexicon, Lexicographi Graeci, vol. 1, pars IV, pp. 631–689.
Φ, ed. A. Adler, Suidae lexicon, Lexicographi Graeci, vol. 1, pars IV, pp. 690–778.
Χ, ed. A. Adler, Suidae lexicon, Lexicographi Graeci, vol. 1, pars IV, pp. 779–837.
Ψ, ed. A. Adler, Suidae lexicon, Lexicographi Graeci, vol. 1, pars IV, pp. 838–854.

supportDesc.extent: ii + 306 + ii at the end foliated as 306–307. 295 215

handDesc.handNote: Δημήτριος Ξανθόπουλος, RGK I, 98; RGK II, 132; RGK III 166. Possibly apograph of MS. Par. gr. 2623; Ms Holkham Gr 111 was made in Milan. See A. Adler, Dissertatio de codicibusSuidae, in Suidae Lexicon, ed. ead., V, Praefationem, indices, dissertationem continens, Stuttgart, 1938, pp. 240–241, and D. Speranzi, ‘Scritture, libri e uomini all’ombra di Bessarione. I. Appunti sulle lettere del Marc. Gr. Z. 527 (coll. 679)’, Rinascimento 57 (2017) 160–161.

decoDesc.decoNote: Almost all the initials of each lemma with no decoration, but in red ink.

physDesc.additions:
fol. ii(v) in pencil, possibly in hand of Frederic Madden: 306 leaves; fol. 124v, monokondylon in red ink: τέλος; fol. 273v (either pen-trial or from a text which was never completed here): τί ταῦτα· fol. 305r: Colophon: + ἐτελειώθειη ὁ παρὼν σουίδας (συίδας, Förster, Schenkl), διὰ χειρὸς ἐμοῦ δημη
τρίου τοῦ ξανθοπούλου ἐν ἔτει ιςωϡωξωβω: +κατὰ μῆνα
φευρουάριον (φευρουαρίου Förster, Schenkl; φευρουάριου Adler, Speranzi) ιδ´ τῆς νῦν τρεχούσης ἰνδικτιῶνος; A later hand (19th c.?) transcribed the text, but omitted number 14 from the date: ἐτελειώθη ὁ παρὼν Σουΐδας διὰ χειρὸς ἐμοῦ δημητρίου τοῦ ξανθοπούλου/ ἐν ἔτει ιςωϡωξωβω: (subscr. 6962) κατὰ μῆνα φευρουάριον τῆς νῦν τρεχούσης ἰνδικτιῶνος. Additions in pencil: Α. Μ. (before 6962) and below 5508/ A. D. 1454 signature of F(rederic) M(adden).

binding.p: Typical Holkham binding of light brown leather, with Coke family ostrich crest in gilt in the centre of the upper cover; Date: early nineteenth century. Rebound by John Jones of Liverpool (worked for Holkham 1816–1823). The spine lettered in gilt: /SUIDÆ/ LEXICON/ GR.// M.S./ SÆC. XII./; in pasted black leather: MS. /HOLKHAM/ Gr. 111/; below, in gilt, shelfmark from the Holkham Binding: 288.

history.provenance: Ownership Notes: paste down, upper, left side (in black ink): signature of Thomas William Coke. Catalogue Nrs: paste down (in pencil): MS. Holkham Gr. 111; fol. i(r) (in pencil): D6B.3 /No 292 (sup lin. 288)= Olim Holkham Hall, Libr. of the Earl of Leicester, 288.

recordHist.source: Description by Dimitrios Skrekas (2020), with the support of the Leventis Foundation, the Oxford Centre for Byzantine Research, the Yerolemou Trust and the Michael Marks Charitable Trust.

ref.title: Pinakes | Πίνακες: Textes et manuscrits grecs
